title: Advantech WebAccess Node viewsrv fClose Untrusted Pointer Dereference Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech WebAccess Node. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the 0x277B IOCTL in the webvrpcs process. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied value prior to dereferencing it as a pointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of Administrator.
addtionnal_details: Advantech has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.us-cert.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-19-178-05
timeline:
2019-03-01 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-07-02 - Coordinated public release of advisory
